author: Staff Reporter
text: Sports Development Authority of Tamil Nadu will select players to participate in Sub-Junior World Cup Football Tournament. The selection will be held at Thoothukudi District Sports Stadium on Saturday and Sunday (January 30 and 31). According to District Sports and Youth Welfare Officer L. Theerthose, sportspersons under 17 years of age from Thoothukudi, Tirunelveli and Kanyakumari districts could participate in the selection to be conducted from 2 p.m. For further details contact mobile number 9710063634.
title: Selection of players for football tourney
